page.title: 07Health
page.content:
Health
There are several hospitals within easy reach of our area where you can benefit from up to date treatment. Other medical facilities like doctors' surgeries, dentists and opticians are scattered throughout the area and are increasing in number. The dentists are well equipped so that any treatment can be carried out as painlessly as possible. The opticians, too, have advanced, modern equipment to carry out accurate examinations to find out exactly the right glasses to give you. There are other important services available. The District Nurse travels around helping all sorts of people, young and old. She gives treatment in patients' houses, such as giving injections. She often has to work very long hours.
